item.title: Rodolfo Ferro
item.description: Matt Stratton is a solutions architect at Chef, where he demonstrates how Chef‚Äôs automation platform provides speed and flexibility to clients‚Äô infrastructure. He is devoted to concepts like Continuous Delivery and Infrastructure as Code, and his license plate actually says ‚ÄúDevOps‚Äù. He lives in Chicago and has an unhealthy obsession with Doctor Who, Firefly, and Game of Thrones. And whiskey.

item.title: Sergio S√°nchez
item.description: My name is Sergio S√°nchez Zavala and I‚Äôm originally from Tijuana, Baja California, M√©xico. I‚Äôm dedicated to making research transparent and reproducible. I‚Äôm a public policy wonk + data and tech nerd.
